channel.title: Workerman on 淡淡忧愁
channel.description: Recent content in Workerman on 淡淡忧愁

item.title: Workerman写的geoip查询的HTTP服务
item.description: geoip2 基于workerman的HTTP协议写的ip查询功能 安装 git clone https://github.com/timzzx/geoip2.git cd geoip2 composer install 自己加入GeoLite2-City.mmdb php index.php 浏览器访问http://127.0.0.1:2345/?ip=115.85.29.130 返回结果： { errno: 200, isoCode: "PH", country_name: "Philippines", country_name_zh: "菲律宾", mostSpecificSubdivisionname: "Metro Manila", mostSpecificSubdivisionisoCode: "00", city_name: "Las Pinas", city_name_zh: null, postal_code: "1612", latitude: 14.4506, longitude: 120.9828 }
